name: EDP445 PIPE RUN (REAL) (2024) (LEAKED GAMEPLAY)
description:
this game is the best flappy bird rip off you will ever play

UNLIMITED REPLAYABILITY

fully immersive gameplay that will have you playing for hours trying to beat your last personal best

ENTERTAINING VIDEOS

there is a video that plays in the game that will have you entertained the entire time you play 

MULTIPLE LEVELS (MORE ON MOBILE)

there is more than 1 level. yep more than 1, you can play for hours on end knowing there is more than 1 level to play with new videos and new entertainment its a win win.

PLAY AS THE CUPCAKE!?

you get to play as the one and only cupcake that EDP was trying to get which is extremely immersive

A GOOD CHALLENGE

the pipes appear very fast which makes you have to think fast, this makes the game a difficult challenge which is enjoyable for some people

ITS FREE!?

the game is completely free which is a great thing so you can just download the game and GRIND it for hours on end with no sleep

MORE CONTENT ON MOBILE (COMING SOON)

there are only a few levels in the pc version of EDP pipe run which is good but the mobile version (COMING SOON) will feature way more than 3 levels and even might have better gameplay so when it releases if you want more content you will have to download it on mobile
